verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Saved by His pow'r divine,
Saved to new life sublime!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Life now is sweet
and my joy is complete,
For I'm saved,
saved, saved.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
I love to tell
how He lifted me,
And what His grace
can do for you.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
He saves me from
ev'ry sin and harm,
Secures my soul
each day;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
I'm leaning strong
on His mighty armâ€“
I know He'll guide me
all the way.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
When poor and needy
and all alone,
In love He said to me,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
"Come unto Me
and I'll lead you home
To live with Me eternally."
